name: Solar System Hero
description:
Solar System Watch however has developed a way to save planets from these dangerous solar winds. A system that reduces the orbital velocity of a planet to dodge approaching winds.

A new wind period is close. Become a Force Field Operator and save planets and save solar systems from total destruction!

Features

  • Stretch your multitasking skills to their limits!
  • A relaxing and at the same time nerve-wracking 3D Arcade type game!
  • 7 unique levels with increasing difficulties!
  • Several different enemy patters to break through!
  • Control up to three detailed planets simultaneously!

Controls

Keyboard: Q, W, E - Mouse
Controller: LT, RT, LB

Download for free or pay what you like :)
